text: Music Theory My Way is a web app designed for people with dyslexia and can be customised in different ways to suit your learning style.
Click on the orange settings icon at any time to update your background colour, font and other settings.
It is possible to use Music Theory My Way on a mobile phone screen, but a tablet or laptop screen is better.
You will be learning about music theory up to grade 2. The green music notes icon takes you to the learning section.
There will be some new words to learn, and they will be explained along the way.
Look up any words you're not sure about in the glossary by clicking the red button.
Click the purple button to take a quiz on everything you've learnt so far.
To come back to the tutorial at any time, click the yellow question mark. For now, click the forwards arrow to go back home.
